abstract: The debut of “I’m a Celebrity … Get Me Out of Here!” trailed behind repeats of CBS’s Monday night sitcoms.
snippet: The debut of “I’m a Celebrity … Get Me Out of Here!” trailed behind repeats of CBS’s Monday night sitcoms.
lead_paragraph: On NBC Monday night, the two-hour live premiere of “I’m a Celebrity… Get Me Out of Here!” drew an average of 6.4 million viewers from 8 to 10 p.m., finishing in a tie with ABC’s “Bachelorette” in its time period.

headline.main: Monday Ratings: CBS Repeats Beat ‘I’m a Celebrity’
